Interface ServerSnapshot

All Superinterfaces:
Snapshot
All Known Implementing Classes:
SnapshotImpl.Server
public sealed interface ServerSnapshot extends Snapshot permits SnapshotImpl.Server
Represents the complete state of the server at a given moment.
